title: Launcher powers down my PC
body:
I'm experiencing a rather odd issue with the launcher. Yesterday the game worked fine. Today, when I try to start the launcher Windows 8 does the typical procedure of asking if I want to allow the program to make changes to the computer, so I click yes, then after a brief delay my computer promptly powers down. I have narrowed the power down issue to the launcher, because it occurs every time I try to start the launcher.

Also note that no shut down procedures of programs closing, etc, occurs. Screen just goes black and the tower's fans turn off. And this happened within a few minutes of turning my computer on for the first time of the day, and I've got a great cooling system, so overheating is not even a semblance of a possibility.

I'm thinking some client files got corrupted, so i want to try to reinstall the program, but the application isn't listed in my control panel so I can't uninstall it.

Some desktop PC Specs:
Nvidia 980TI GPU
Intel Core i7 4790K
16GB ram
ASUS Maximus VII Ranger motherboard

Is there an uninstall utility or other technique I can use to try reinstalling the game? Does anyone have any suggestions on how to fix this problem?

Thank you.

EDIT: I do not use LOLrecorder and have never installed it or any other LOL recording programs on this computer.

replies.body:
Hey Fortune 500,

That does sounds pretty strange. Running the Uninstall Utility through Windows Control Panel should be sufficient for removing the game, but it sounds like you may be experiencing a problem with hardware. I'd recommend [submitting a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with a description of the issue. Our support agents will be able to help diagnose the problem you're having.

If you do submit a support ticket, please make sure to grab the following logs:

1) [Direct X Diagnostic](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)

2) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3) 

3) [Launcher logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq6)

These logs will make it easier for the support agent to understand what's happening. Please let me know if you have any questions!

Thank you for the response! I appreciate it. Turns out the fix was as strange as the solution. I just downloaded the installer and ran it. The installer acted like the program wasn't on the machine (didn't ask to uninstall, repair, etc.). After running the installer like it was a fresh install the launcher started running fine.
